configuration.sql: select c.* from Casting c left join tablaVolcado d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO  where d.SERNO IS NULL

select  "fallo_casting" as TableName, "TYPE_MISMATCH" as Error, current_timestamp as RawDate, c.rawData 
	from Datetime c left join Casting d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO  where d.SERNO IS NULL

select "fallo_rango" as TableName, "FORMAT_MISMATCH" as Error, current_timestamp as RawDate , c.rawData
from no_duplicados c left join rango_msgflags d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO  where d.SERNO IS NULL

nodes.name: fallo_duplicados
nodes.description: Hay que ver si mandamos la fila del parquet o la del Casting

configuration.sql:
select  "fallo_duplicados" as TableName, "DUPLICATED_KEY" as Error, current_timestamp as RawDate, c.rawData
	from Casting c inner join tablaVolcado d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO

SELECT *,
  (CASE 
     WHEN CARDPRODUCTSERNO IN (726,730,736,740) THEN 2  
     ELSE 1
   END) AS ID_EMPRS
FROM rango_msgflags

select  "fallo-refdate" as TableName, "DATE_ERROR" as Error, current_timestamp as RawDate, c.rawData 
	from Csv c left join Datetime d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO where d.SERNO IS NULL
select * from no_duplicados where MSGFLAGS in (0, 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 16384)

select  "fallo_id_emprs" as TableName, "FAILED_FIELD_CREATION" as Error, current_timestamp as RawDate, c.rawData 
	from rango_msgflags c left join new_field_id_emprs d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO  where d.SERNO IS NULL

select  "error_tm_trusted" as TableName, "FAILED_FIELD_CREATION" as Error, current_timestamp as RawDate, c.rawData 
	from new_field_id_emprs c left join tm_trusted_field d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO  where d.SERNO IS NULL

select  "fallo_dt_trusted" as TableName, "FAILED_FIELD_CREATION" as Error, current_timestamp as RawDate, c.rawData 
	from tm_trusted_field c left join dt_trusted_field d on c.SERNO = d.SERNO  where d.SERNO IS NULL
